A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Aside from a few moments of poor dialogue\, it was a wonderful Star Wars movie and one of the most beautiful films I've seen in a long time. Kept me guessing until the end\, and had rich emotional payoffs. Some superfans will be put off by the unfamiliar content\, but I think it did a great job of moving the franchise into the modern age.\nPROS: Beautifully shot\, great acting from the leads\, keeps you guessing.\nCONS: Some weak dialogue\, could use more worldbuilding\, needs more gays.
